backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with user profiles, books, carts, orders, KYC mappings, authorization, and a catalog export method; includes storage and access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence items with associated files, components, tests, and confidence for rollback, versioning, and UI validation workflows.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptions of numerous frontend files including components, pages, and utilities used throughout the app.
frontend/.env.production: Sets production build environment variables indicating Live mode and version 29.
frontend/docs/deployment-preflight.md: Explains deployment preflight rules including version‑29 enforcement for Live and the separate rollback workflow for older versions.
frontend/docs/draft-rebuild-v29.md: Describes how to rebuild Draft Version 29 safely without affecting the Live deployment or backend canister.
frontend/docs/draft-regression-checks.md: Lists regression checks to verify catalog visibility, book details, error handling, and console stability before promoting a draft.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v22.md: Provides a detailed smoke‑test checklist for validating that Version 22 functions correctly after publishing to Live.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29-report: Template for recording Version 29 Live smoke test results with structured PASS/FAIL sections and environment details.
frontend/docs/live-smoke-test-v29.md: Manual checklist for verifying Version 29 on Live, covering environment, catalog, details pages, purchase flow, and admin tests.
frontend/docs/publish-live.md: Instructions and safety rules for publishing Version 29 to Live, enforcing strict version locking and frontend-only deployment.
frontend/docs/releases/v29-live-publish-: Execution log documenting the successful Version 29 Live frontend deployment, validations, and post-deploy checks.
frontend/docs/releases/v29-live-smoke-te: Completed Version 29 Live smoke test report template for operators to fill out during verification.
frontend/docs/rollback-to-v35.md: Procedure for frontend-only rollback to Version 35 in Draft mode to restore catalog visibility without touching backend state.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color variables, theming, and base layout for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the frontend application via main.tsx.
frontend/scripts/check-displayed-version: Scans frontend source files for hardcoded version labels and fails if any version other than 29 is found.
Validates VERSION equals 35 and checks source files and Footer.tsx for correct Version 35 usage during rollback.
frontend/scripts/deployment-preflight.sh: Runs preflight checks for Version 29 frontend-only deployment, enforcing version locks and validating environment and build files.
frontend/scripts/enforce-version-29.sh: Enforces that VERSION is exactly 29 and blocks Live deployment otherwise.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v22-hel: Prints a manual smoke‑test checklist and key URLs for verifying Version 22 Live deployment.
frontend/scripts/live-smoke-test-v29-hel: Displays key URLs and manual smoke‑test steps for validating Version 29 on Live.
frontend/scripts/publish-live.sh: Publishes Version 29 frontend to Live, enforcing version checks and running displayed‑version validation before deployment.
frontend/scripts/rebuild-draft-v29.sh: Rebuilds the frontend in Draft mode enforcing Version 29, regenerates bindings, cleans artifacts, and builds without touching the backend.
frontend/scripts/rollback-frontend-v35.s: Performs a frontend-only rollback to Version 35 in Draft mode, updating VERSION, rebuilding, verifying, and deploying the frontend canister.
frontend/scripts/rollback-preflight.sh: Runs preflight checks for Version 35 rollback, validating files, environment, dependencies, and safety constraints.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures the app router and theme provider, defining all main routes and rendering the layout and toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/BookMediaM: Admin tool for uploading and removing book media files with progress tracking, validation, and toast notifications.
Protects admin routes by checking identity and admin status, showing loading, error, or recovery options as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with status handling, query reset, and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Displays a dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name, handling validation and errors.
frontend/src/components/books/BookCard.t: Renders a book card with cover, title, pricing, availability badges, and navigation to book details.
frontend/src/components/books/CoverImage: Shows a book cover image using an uploaded file or fallback images with error handling.
frontend/src/components/checkout/KycVeri: Collects and validates user ID or certificate numbers for KYC, submitting them and showing verification status.
frontend/src/components/checkout/SelfieC: Empty placeholder file for selfie capture functionality.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Reusable empty-state UI component displaying an icon, title, description, and optional action.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Displays site footer with social links, copyright, version info, and support chat.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Top navigation bar showing branding, links, user balance, cart status, and auth-controlled sections.
frontend/src/components/layout/Layout.ts: Main layout wrapper including header, footer, routed content, and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Wrapper component providing consistent page padding and configurable max width.
frontend/src/components/library/BookCont: Dialog showing purchased book content and downloadable media with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/library/LibraryP: Provides a button that downloads a purchased book’s PDF using the actor API and shows loading and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/support/Customer: Implements a dialog for submitting support messages and viewing message threads with admin responses.
frontend/src/config/environment.ts: Normalizes build-time environment variables into a Draft or Live environment value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminRecovery.ts: Offers a mutation to recover admin access with mapped error messages and invalidates admin status on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides hooks for fetching and saving the caller’s user profile and checking admin status.
frontend/src/hooks/useBalance.ts: Fetches the user’s token balance and provides a mutation for minting tokens with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useBooks.ts: Supplies queries and mutations for listing, retrieving, creating, updating, and uploading PDFs for books.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Manages cart operations including fetching, adding, removing, checkout, and computing totals with book data.
frontend/src/hooks/useCatalogTransfer.ts: Exports or imports full catalog state and invalidates all related caches after import.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useKyc.ts: Defines a mutation hook to submit KYC document identifiers through the actor API and invalidates cart data on success. Handles backend error strings and returns verified status.
frontend/src/hooks/useLibrary.ts: Provides hooks to derive a user's library from their delivered orders and to fetch purchased book content or media. Includes a utility to fetch a purchased book's PDF bytes.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Contains hooks for fetching a single order, a user's own orders using their identity, and all orders. Uses actor availability and identity checks for query enabling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing; query hooks are defined elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useResetStore.ts: Defines an admin-only mutation to reset store data and invalidates related query caches. Handles permission errors and generic failures.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupportChat.ts: Provides hooks for sending support messages, retrieving user/admin messages, fetching message responses, and replying as admin. Uses polling and actor-based queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining theme variables for light and dark modes with a bookstore color palette. Applies global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider. Imports global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCatalogPag: Provides an interface for admins to view, filter, add, edit, and manage books in the catalog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Serves as the main admin hub with tabbed navigation to catalog, orders, minting, support, and settings pages.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminMintPage.t: Allows admins to mint GLDT tokens by submitting a principal and token amount.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all customer orders with item details, totals, and timestamps for admin review.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminRecoveryPa: Enables admins to recover access using Internet Identity, showing login prompts and recovery status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Provides tools for resetting the store, exporting catalog data, and importing catalog files with various modes.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSupportInb: Admin UI for viewing support message threads and sending replies, grouping messages and handling refresh and responses.
frontend/src/pages/BookDetailsPage.tsx: Renders book details with purchase options, handles add-to-cart logic, loading states, and error toasts. Pulls book data and identity to conditionally allow purchases.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, handles item removal, detects invalid quantities, and navigates to checkout if valid.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogPage.tsx: Shows all books with search filtering, loading states, and error handling for failed fetches.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Validates cart state, balance, and KYC requirements before submitting an order and navigating to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders a hero section and a featured books grid pulled from available books.
frontend/src/pages/MyLibraryPage.tsx: Displays purchased books, allows reading or downloading content, and handles loading or empty states.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Shows purchase confirmation, order details, and navigation options after checkout.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseConfirmationP: Displays purchase confirmation with navigation options to the library, order details, or catalog.
frontend/src/utils/catalogTransfer.ts: Validates, parses, and merges catalog JSON data, supporting overwrite and merge import modes for CatalogState.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Utility functions to download raw data, URLs, or JSON files via generated Blob links.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Helpers for formatting token amounts, principals, and timestamps into user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/utils/kyc.ts: Provides KYC identifier creation and basic validation for document numbers.
Detects KYC-related purchase restriction errors and maps them to friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/orderId.ts: Generates a unique order ID based on timestamp and randomness.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Parses and validates principal strings using the ICP SDK.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending themes, colors, animations, and enabling plugins.
frontend/VERSION: Stores the enforced frontend version number, currently 29.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing features, requirements, and rollback-related configuration.
